statements: SELECT * FROM policy_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM policy_documents WHERE document_type = 'Terms';
SELECT id, document_name, date_uploaded FROM policy_documents ORDER BY date_uploaded DESC;
SELECT document_name, uploaded_by FROM policy_documents WHERE uploaded_by = 'Admin' ORDER BY document_name ASC;
SELECT document_content FROM policy_documents WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents ORDER BY date_uploaded DESC, document_name ASC;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM policy_documents WHERE uploaded_by = 'John Smith';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_documents, document_type FROM policy_documents GROUP BY document_type;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy' AND uploaded_by LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT document_name, date_uploaded FROM policy_documents WHERE date_uploaded >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_uploaded DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_title, document_date FROM policy_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_title, document_owner FROM policy_documents WHERE document_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_title, document_content FROM policy_documents ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents WHERE document_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT user_name, action_date, action_description FROM audit_trails ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT document_title, document_owner FROM policy_documents WHERE document_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY document_owner DESC, document_title ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents WHERE document_owner = 'Alice' AND document_title LIKE '%privacy%' ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT document_title, document_date FROM policy_documents WHERE document_owner = 'Bob' AND document_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT document_owner, COUNT(*) AS document_count FROM policy_documents GROUP BY document_owner HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY document_count DESC;

SELECT at.action_performed, at.user_name, pd.document_title FROM audit_trails at JOIN policy_documents pd ON at.action_date = pd.document_date WHERE at.action_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY at.user_name, pd.document_title;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents;
SELECT document_id, document_text FROM policy_documents WHERE document_type = 'Terms';
SELECT document_id, document_text, document_type FROM policy_documents ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT disclosure_id, disclosure_text, date_published FROM disclosures WHERE disclosure_type = 'Full Disclosure';
SELECT trail_id, action_performed, date_logged FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM policy_documents ORDER BY date_created DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT document_text, document_type FROM policy_documents WHERE document_type = 'privacy' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM disclosures WHERE date_published >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_published ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT disclosure_text, disclosure_type FROM disclosures WHERE disclosure_type = 'important' ORDER BY date_published DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY date_logged DESC LIMIT 7;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM policy_documents ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT disclosure_name, disclosure_content, disclosure_date FROM disclosures WHERE disclosure_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action, action_date FROM audit_trails WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, log_details FROM compliance_logs WHERE log_type = 'error';
SELECT * FROM policy_documents ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM policy_documents WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_name, upload_date FROM policy_documents WHERE document_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM disclosures WHERE disclosure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY disclosure_date DESC;
SELECT disclosure_name, disclosure_content, disclosure_date FROM disclosures WHERE disclosure_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Policy_Documents WHERE effective_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, policy_content FROM Policy_Documents WHERE LENGTH(policy_content) > 100;
SELECT user_id, action_performed, action_timestamp FROM Audit_Trails ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Policy_Documents WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, effective_date FROM Policy_Documents WHERE policy_name LIKE 'Privacy%';
SELECT user_id, action_performed, action_timestamp FROM Audit_Trails ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Compliance_Status WHERE is_compliant = FALSE AND last_checked < '2022-01-01';
